title: My Sharona Recipe
full_text:
My Sharona Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
6
fresh
raspberries
2
ounces
white
rum
, such as Brugal Extra Dry
1
ounce
fresh juice
from
1
whole
lemon
Barspoon
agave syrup
(see note)
3
ounces
ginger beer
Directions
Muddle raspberries in a mixing glass. Add ice, rum, lemon juice, and agave syrup. Shake vigorously for 10 seconds. Strain into an ice-filled Collins glass and top off with ginger beer. Stir gently before serving.
Special equipment
muddler, cocktail shaker and strainer
Rum
Raspberry
